scripts.build: npm run lint && run-p build:native:all build:ts
scripts.postbuild: chmod +x dist/index.js && mkdir -p bin && ln -sf ../dist/index.js bin/konflikt
scripts.build:native:all: npm run build:native:release && npm run build:native:debug
scripts.build:native:release: cmake-js compile -l error --directory src/native --out dist/native/Release --config Release -- -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON
scripts.build:native:debug: cmake-js compile -l error --directory src/native --out dist/native/Debug --config Debug -- -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON
scripts.rebuild:native: npm run rebuild:native:release && npm run rebuild:native:debug
scripts.rebuild:native:release: cmake-js rebuild -l error --directory src/native --out dist/native/Release --config Release -- -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON
scripts.rebuild:native:debug: cmake-js rebuild -l error --directory src/native --out dist/native/Debug --config Debug -- -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON
